title: changing board color option
body: This dark blue theme is killing me. I would like to browse this board in a more _Cheerful_ , _lighter_ color, please add an option where we could choose the theme that suits us. ty.

replies.body: We have no plans to add additional color schemes right now, but you can take control with a user stylesheet like Not Pwyff suggested here!
